channel.title: Spring Boot on Trisha Gee
channel.description: Recent content in Spring Boot on Trisha Gee

item.title: Fully Reactive: Spring, Kotlin, JavaFX, and MongoDB Playing Together
item.description: Spring Framework 5 brings full reactive support to developers everywhere. What better way to demo reactive programming than to actually build something live? This sessionâ€™s presenters perform a daring feat of pair programming/dueling coding to create an end-to-end application by using Spring Framework 5, Spring Boot, Reactor, Kotlin, JavaFX, REST, and MongoDB, all built with IntelliJ IDEA. What could possibly go wrong?
